block.p: FISCHMAN-Ned. Of Pembroke Pines, FL. formerly of Hillside on Monday. September 25th. Beloved husband of Gertrude (nee Bauer). Devoted father of Michael Eric Fischman (wife Elyse) of Chappaqua, NY, Herbert William Fischman (wife Jennifer) of Mamaroneck, NY and Jacob Fredrick Fischman of Santa Monica, Ca. Dear brother of Ella Taufield of Stamford, CT. and brother-in-law of Audrey Fischman of West Orange, NJ. Loving grandfather of Brian, Jeremy, James, Lauren & Sophie. Graveside services King Solomon Cemetery, Clifton, N.J. today at 11 AM. For information Jewish Memorial Chapel, Clifton.
